_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

HEATMAP - Minus strand


```{r}

combined_minus <- bind_rows(
   anc1 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "anc1"),
   anc2 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "anc2"),
   cannatonic %>% mutate(Cultivar = "cannatonic"),
   cannbio %>% mutate(Cultivar = "cannbio"),
   CP %>% mutate(Cultivar = "CP"),
   hOG1 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "hOG1"),
   hOG2 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "hOG2"),
   JL %>% mutate(Cultivar = "JL"),
   Ppepper %>% mutate(Cultivar = "Ppepper"),
   PR %>% mutate(Cultivar = "PR"),
   SL1 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "SL1"),
   travisCBD2 %>% mutate(Cultivar = "t2"),
)

```

```{r}

minus_presence_matrix <- combined_minus %>%
  distinct(Plant, V1) %>%
  mutate(value = 1) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Plant, values_from = value, values_fill = 0) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-V1, names_to = "Plant", values_to = "Present")

```




```{r}

n_rows_minus <- length(unique(minus_presence_matrix$V1))

height_minus <- max(6, n_rows * 0.15)  

heatmap_minus <- 
  ggplot(minus_presence_matrix, aes(x = Plant, y = V1, fill = factor(Present))) +
  geom_tile(color = "white") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("0" = "white", "1" = "darkgreen")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(fill = "Present", 
       title = "Predicted TF binding sites presence across different Cannabis S. cultivars - minus strand") +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 6, angle = 45, lineheight = 1.2),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 45, hjust = 1))

ggsave("heatmap_minus2.png", plot = heatmap_minus, width = 8, height = height_minus, dpi = 300, bg = "white")

```

REGULATION PREDICTION + BINDING SITE PREDICTION - samo s promotorjem (2000bp pred genom)



Minus strand

```{r}

colnames(minus_presence_matrix)[2] <- "Cultivar"

minus_combined_reg_binding_matrix <- intersect(minus_presence_matrix, minus_reg_presence_matrix) 

```


```{r}
heatmap_minus_reg_binding_combined <- 
  ggplot(minus_combined_reg_binding_matrix, aes(x = Cultivar, y = V1, fill = factor(Present))) +
  geom_tile(color = "white") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("0" = "white", "1" = "darkgreen")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(fill = "Present", 
       title = "Predicted Binding + Regulatory sites presence across different C. Sativa cultivars (cbdas) - minus st.") + 
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 6, angle = 45, lineheight = 1.2),
       axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 45, hjust = 1))

print(heatmap_minus_reg_binding_combined)

ggsave("heatmap_minus_reg_binding_combined.png", plot = heatmap_minus_reg_binding_combined, width = 10, 
       height = max(6, length(unique(minus_combined_reg_binding_matrix$V1)) * 0.15), 
       dpi = 300, bg = "white")
```
